task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 353Â°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure, as my current pitch is level with the horizon.
With the camera pitched up, I can now observe the top of the building; estimating the height requires a full view from top to bottom.
I have now seen both the top and bottom of the building, allowing me to estimate its height based on the visual proportions and known distances.
